[\[169b.5\]]par thos pa dang nyes par thos pa la mi 'byed pa dang /_legs par smras pa dang nyes par smra ba la bag la nyal med pa dang /_ro myong ba'i nyes dmigs rnams la mtshungs par yongs su 'jal ba dang /_sems can thams cad la bsam pa mnyam po dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_
[\[169b.6\]]rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams la 'du shes mnyam pa dang /_bsngags pa dang bsngags pa ma yin pa rnams la sems mnyam pa dang /_bde ba dang mi bde ba rnams la rang gi sems yongs su dag pa ste/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar gang bsti stang du byed pa dang /_gnod par byed pa
[\[169b.7\]]la mthon dman du mi sems shing /_de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms

[\[170a.1\]]gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad kyang khong khro bar mi byed cing mi tshol te btang snyoms pa yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par 'gyur pa las sam/_ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba las kyang rung ste/_gnyis ka las bzod

[\[170a.3\]]byas ma yin/_yid kyi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin/_chos kyi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin te/_de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_rma mi phyin cing nyams pa med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/rma phyung ba la rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga
[\[170a.4\]]bsrung bas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/phan par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/btang snyoms ni mchog tu rtsod pa med pa'o/_/btang snyoms ni rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'o/_/btang snyoms ni gzhan gyi sems bsrung
[\[170a.5\]]pa'o/_/btang snyoms ni bdag la rtog pa'o/_/btang snyoms ni sems can gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o/_/btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs yin te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/de la byang
[\[170a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i dus dang dus ma yin pa la btang snyoms gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du btang snyoms bya bar bka' mi stsol to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i rtag tu bdag dang gzhan gyi dge ba'i chos btsal ba la brtson zhing
[\[170a.7\]]'bad par bya ba'i phyir te/_des dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms par bya'o/_/de la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/_snod du gyur pa ma yin pa dang /_nyan par mi 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_smad pa dang mi snyan pa dang sdug

[\[170b.1\]]bsngal ba la btang snyoms dang /_sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa can skyon med pa la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms dang /_sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang /_tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang /_bzod pa'i dus na brtson 'grus brtul ba'i
[\[170b.2\]]btang snyoms dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dus na bsam gtan brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang /_bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin pa la chags pa brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang /_shes rab kyi dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa la brtul ba'i btang snyoms te/_'di ni dus dang dus ma yin pa
[\[170b.3\]]la btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ni thabs chen por yongs su gzung bar bya ste/_sems can sna tshogs pa'i don gyi bya ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thabs chen po zhes bya ba'i sgrar gsungs te/_de bas na bcom ldan 'das ni thabs che ba zhes bya'o/_/de nyid
[\[170b.4\]]kyis na mkhas pa chen po ste/_thabs kyi bya ba la mkhas shing byas par mdzad pas so/_/de la 'dir rim pa ni 'di yin te/_byams pa chen pos ni sems can thams cad phan pa la nges par sbyor bar mdzad do/_/thugs rje chen pos ni de dag nyid bag yod pa la khong du chud pa'i bde ba la rab
[\[170b.5\]]tu bkod par mdzad do/_/dga' ba chen pos ni dga' ba chen po la 'jog go/_/btang snyoms chen pos ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba'i chos kyi sku'i mnyam pa nyid la 'jog par mdzad pa yin no/_/de ltar 'dir yi ge dang 'gal bar bshad do zhes bya ba'i som nyi mi bya'o/_/yang
[\[170b.6\]]na gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi rim pas ni sbyin bdag chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan du yang bshad do/_/de la sbyin bdag chen po zhes bya ba ni mchog tu bde ba 'byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chu'i rgyun 'bab pa'i ngo bor gyur pa gang la yod pa de ni sbyin bdag chen po yin la/_de'i bdag
[\[170b.7\]]po pas sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo yin te/_de yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i skus thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa'i lha mo sgeg
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]mo'i gzugs can gyi bdag por gyur pa'i phyir te/_gang phyi rol pa'i bdag nyid pas/_/sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du/_/byang chub yan lag 'bras ster bas/_/phreng ba tshul khrims pha rol phyin/_/zhes gsungs pas/_byang

[\[171a.3\]]khrims chen po ste/_de 'chang bas na tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'o/_/thams cad kyi gtso bo'i gzugs su gnas pas na mchog go/_/bzod pa chen po ni lha mo rdo rje dbyangs ma'i ngo bo ste/_zhi ba'i chos la rjes mos pas/_/glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/_/zhes gsungs pas so/_/_

[\[171a.5\]]yin/_/zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas mchod la skyon med pas/_/gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de ltar sbyar ba yin gyi rang dgar byas pas brtags pa ni ma yin no/_/bsam gtan chen po gang la yod pa de ni bsam
[\[171a.6\]]gtan chen po ste de rnams dang lhan cig bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas nyid 'bras rgyu yin pas/_/me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje me

[\[181b.1\]]pa'am/_thag ring ba'i phyogs na gnas pa'am/_bar mtshams med par gnas na rnam par shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur/_'dus pa'i phyogs ltar na bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dus sam/_/phyogs gcig gis 'dus/_bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'dus na ni cha shas med par 'gyur bas

[\[189a.2\]]ba ma yin pa nyid yin no/_/de bas na dpyod pa can gyis btags pa ni btags pa kho na tsam du zad do/_/gcer bu pa rnams kyang rma bya'i spu yang sbrug cing gar byed bzhin du lus phyi'i dri mas bsgos pa dang /_bdag yod par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir langs te smras
[\[189a.3\]]pa bdag ni mngon sum nyid du rjes su 'jug pa dang bzlog pa'i rang bzhin gnyis kyis bdag nyid can du nye bar dmigs so/_/de yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i gnas skabs tha dad du zin kyang gnas pa po gang yin/_/de ni gnas skabs thams cad du
[\[189a.4\]]sems dang ldan par nye bar dmigs su rung ste/_bdag de ni rdzas yin no/_/rnam grangs su ni bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbye bas rim gyis 'byung ba yin la/_de ni mngon sum du grub pa yin no/_/de yang chos dang chos can gnyis ni yul dang dus
[\[189a.5\]]kyi rang bzhin dbye bas dbye ba med la/_grangs dang /_ming dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_bya ba'i dbye bas dbye ba yod pa yin te/_dper na bum pa dang /_de'i gzugs la sogs pa bzhin te/_bum pa dang gzugs la sogs pa ni yul la sogs pas dbye ba
[\[189a.6\]]med pa yin te/_bum pa'i phyogs dang dus rang bzhin gang kho na yin pa de nyid ni de'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yang yin no/_/grangs la sogs pa ni bum pa las gzugs la sogs pa dbye ba yod pa yin te/_de yang grangs kyi dbye ba ni gcig dang gnyis la sogs pa'o/_/_

[\[194a.1\]]pas sangs rgyas nyid thob pa las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i gsung mnga' bas ni tshig bden no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni bden pa'o/_/de las gzhan pa thams cad ni brdzun

[\[194a.3\]]ston pa po/_/zhes bya ba la/_bden pa bzhi ni 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /_kun 'byung gi bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa gang zhe na/_'khor bar gyur pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal

[\[194a.6\]]dang /_lta ba'i rgyu 'di ni kun 'byung ba ste/_gang sred pa'i rgyu dang lta ba'i rgyu yang dag par len pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa dang /_yongs su tshol ba 'di ni kun 'byung shes pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/gang phung po lnga po rnams kyi zad pa dang /_mthar thug

[\[194b.1\]]lam gang zhig rtogs pas sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa la reg par gyur cing rjes su shes pa 'jug pa 'di ni 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sgrub pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/'di gang stong pa nyid shes pa 'di ni

[\[195a.1\]]bcad pa gsum gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid bstan pa ni/_phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong /_/'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul/_/nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba/_/'byung ba chen po'i rgyu gcig po/_/dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad/_/'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul/_/bde ba rnyed

[\[196a.1\]]'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pas zhen pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'dod chags dang bral zhing bor ba de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o/_/ji ltar na dbang po thul ba yin zhe na/_nyan thos la sogs pa ltar dbang po bsdams pas dbang po thul ba ni ma

[\[198b.1\]]tshig ni glegs bam gang la yang med pas na skad kyi byings Sh+Tha bu ni ra sa na ni sha ma na yo zhes bya ba'i skad kyi byings la brten pas na/_shes pa 'ba' zhig nges bsal pa/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/shes rab nyid mtshon cha yin pas na shes rab kyi mtshon cha rnon po gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/gang
[\[198b.2\]]de lta bu'i shes rab kyi mtshon cha dang ldan pa ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la yod pa'i ma rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyis 'joms pa'o/_/gang gi tshe tshig rnam par phye ba de'i tshe ni shes rab kyi mtshon cha gang la mnga' ba de ni shes rab mtshon cha'o/_/log pa'i blo gros 'joms pas na rnam

[\[224a.2\]]mi zer zhing mi smod la/_snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas ro stod seng ge lta bu dang /_phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/_de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so/_/na ba rnams la rtsi sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang /_rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas
[\[224a.3\]]pa dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog ste/_de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/_/skyed mos tshal dang 'khor dang btung ba dang /_rdzing bu dang brgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang kha zas dang phreng ba'i gnas dang stegs dang gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan la byin
[\[224a.4\]]pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/_de ni mnga' ba chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/_/yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/_de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i
[\[224a.5\]]gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/_/gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /_mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang /_zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang /_gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /_ma dkrugs shing gsal ba'o/_/yun
[\[224a.6\]]ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing dus su smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/_de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/_/rim gro bya ba dang /_brnyes pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /_mnyam pa ste/_de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so/_/yun
[\[224a.7\]]ring po nas blta zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang pa ste/_de ni 'khor dbyer mi byed pa'i snga ltas so/_/pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes pas bsam pa med la/_ma chags mi sdang ba dang /_rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis blta bas
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/_/de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/_/rab 'byor de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad la/_gal te bzhed na/_'jig
[\[224b.2\]]rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i 'og dang /_steng dag tu snang bar mdzad kyang sems can rnams la rjes su thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'od 'dom gang bar byin gyis brlabs shing bzhugs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom gang bar byin gyis brlabs su zin na rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi zil gyis
[\[224b.3\]]mnan pas nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang shes par mi 'gyur zhing /_zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang lo rnams kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin gyis 'od 'phro ba'am/_dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par mdzad cing de bzhin du gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi nas ji srid bzhed
[\[224b.4\]]pa de srid kyi bar du 'od kyis snang bar mdzad cing gsung gis khyab par mdzad de/_de lta bu'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' bas na/_sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/_/zhes bya ba ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad brgyan
[\[224b.5\]]pas mdzes pa'i phyir 'jig rten gsum na sdug pa yin te/_de la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/_/'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/_sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/_bshes gnyen byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa
[\[224b.6\]]dang /_bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/_rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/_sen mo mtho ba yin/_tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/_sor mo zlum pa yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu stsogs pa ste/_sor mo rgyas pa yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/_
[\[224b.7\]]sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_thugs dang gsung dang sku'i phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/_rtsa mi mngon pa yin/_nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste/_rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/_shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/_long bu mi mngon pa yin/_mi mnyam pa thams cad las
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sgrol ba ste zhabs mnyam pa yin/_mi'i seng ge ste/_seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/_mi'i glang po ste glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/_ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/_mi'i khyu mchog ste khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/_
[\[225a.2\]]mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/_g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/_blta na mdzes pa ste/_mdzes par bzhud pa yin/_rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/_ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/_tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/_sku shin tu legs pa yin/_sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu
[\[225a.3\]]sbyangs pa ste/_sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/_sku chos rim gyis ston pa ste/_sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/_sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/_rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i
[\[225a.4\]]thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_chos 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/_yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/_sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku legs par mnyam pa yin/_shin
[\[225a.5\]]tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/_sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/_rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/_sku zhum pa med pa yin/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/_sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/_yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/_sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/_rten cing
[\[225a.6\]]'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/_yan lag dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/_gzigs pa shin tu dag pa ste/_snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/_tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_phyal zlum pa yin/_'khor ba'i nyes pa
[\[225a.7\]]thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/_nga rgyal gyi mde'u bcom pa ste/_phyal ma zhom pa yin/_chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/_phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/_chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/_lte ba zab pa yin/_mthun par 'dzin
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/_slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/_kun nas mdzes pa yin/_thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/_kun du spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/_chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/_
[\[225b.2\]]sku la sme ba med pa yin/_shing bal ltar rab tu yang pa rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/_phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/_rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/_shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo
[\[225b.3\]]zab pa yin/_bzod pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa ste/_phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/_bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/_zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin/_gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bkye ba ste/_zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/_'jam pa sngon du btang
[\[225b.4\]]zhing 'dul ba ste/_ljags mnyen pa yin/_yon tan 'thad pa mang ba ste/_ljags shin tu srab pa yin/_byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos 'dul ba gting dpag dka' ba ste/_ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/_glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyems pa mi mnga' ba ste/_
[\[225b.5\]]glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/_snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/_snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/_srid par kun du sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/_tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/_skye bo rno ba
[\[225b.6\]]rnams 'dul ba ste/_tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/_chos 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/_tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/_sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/_mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/_tshems mche ba rim gyis
[\[225b.7\]]gzhol ba yin/_shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/_shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/_gdul ba'i skye bo gtsang ba mnga' ba ste/_shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/_spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_gzigs pa
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/_spyan rnam par dag pa yin/_sems can gyi tshogs shin tu drangs pa ste/_rdzi ma stug pa yin/_lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang na chung mchog mig dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba
[\[226a.2\]]ste/_spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/_rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/_smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/_'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/_smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/_skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[226a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/_smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/_chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/_snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/_nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/_snyan mnyam pa yin/_sems
[\[226a.4\]]can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/_snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/_zhal dpral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/_phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/_zhal dang dpral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/_smon
[\[226a.5\]]lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/_dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin/_yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste/_dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/_mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/_dbu stug pa yin/_thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i
[\[226a.6\]]snying po thugs su chud pa ste/_dbu 'jam pa yin/_rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/_dbu mi 'dzing pa yin/_brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/_dbu mi rtsub pa yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/_dbu'i dri zhim pa yin/_
[\[226a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin te/_de ltar sku'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rdzogs par mdzes par gyur pas na/_sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/_/zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten pa'i ye shes dang yon tan rnams
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/_'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te/_/zhes bya'o/_/chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad rnams la thams cad du log pa'i lam las bzlog cing /_dam pa'i spyod pa rnams 'dzin du 'dzud par mdzad pas na/_'jig rten slob dpon no/_/de lta na yang tha snyad kyi
[\[226b.2\]]nyes pa'i dogs pa thams cad dang bral bas na/_'jigs pa med pa ste bsnyengs pa dang bral ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/de nyid gcig pu ni 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ngan 'gro ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnams las skyob pas na skyob pa'o/_/'jig rten yid gcugs pa zhes bya ba ni/_slu
[\[226b.3\]]bar mi mdzad pa dang /_nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba ni yid gcugs pa'o/_/de yang /_lung ni yid ches tshig yin te/_nyes zad lung du shes par bya/_nyes pa zad par brdzun gyi tshig_/smra bar mi 'gyur rgyu med phyir/_/zhes bshad pas so/_/'jig rten gsum po thams cad na de nyid yid gcugs pa
[\[226b.4\]]yin gyi tshangs pa la sogs pa ni ma yin te/_log pa'i bdag nyid can la mngon par zhen pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/don gyi gtso bo sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i mi slu ba'i lam nye bar ston pas bden pa yin gyi/_cung zad tsam gyi bden pa ni so so'i skye bo rnams la yang yod mod kyi/_de tsam gyis ni yid
[\[226b.5\]]gcugs pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba las gzhan la ni don gyi gtso bo med do zhes rgya cher bshad zin pas yang ma smras so/_/de nyid kyis ni/_skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med/_/ces bya ste nyon mongs pa'i dgra bo thams cad kyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dgra bo zhi bar mdzad
[\[226b.6\]]pa'i phyir dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs gong nas gong du nye bar brtan par byed pa ni tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_dbang phyug la sogs pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba gzhan rnams la yod pa ma yin pas na/_bla na med pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'i longs spyod yang
[\[226b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos dang /_zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can te/_de lta bu'i longs spyod gang zhig spyod pa de ni/_nam mkha'i mtha' las longs spyod pa/_/zhes bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rnams ni thams cad mkhyen
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]pa'i ye shes so/_/de ni 'jug par dka' ba nyid dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas na/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho/_/zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar sgo nga'i sbubs
[\[227a.2\]]kyi nang na gnas pa rnams ni phyi rol na snang ba shin tu gsal bar gnas kyang gzugs rnams mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du ma rig pa'i yan lag gi sbubs kyi rab rib kyi nang na gnas pa rnams la yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba bstan du zin kyang chos thams cad bdag med pa'i de kho na nyid mthong bar mi
[\[227a.3\]]nus kyi/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rnams kyis ni mthong bar nus te/_de kho na nyid mthong ba'i rkyen gyis chos thams cad bdag med par thugs su chud pa'i rdo rjes bdag tu gti mug pa la sogs pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib thams cad yang dag par bsal bas na/_ma rig sgo
[\[227a.4\]]nga'i sbubs 'byed pa/_/zhes bya'o/_/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ni srid pa ste/_sems can rnams 'dir yang dang yang du 'byung ba yin pas na srid pa'o/_/srid pa nyid 'ching ba'i gnas su gyur pas na dra ba'o/_/shes rab kyi ral gris phyin ci log ma lus pa'i 'ching ba rnam par 'joms pas na/_srid
[\[227a.5\]]pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/_/zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs ma lus zhes bya ba ni las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/_kun nas nyon mongs pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don gyis gzhan dag kyang gzung bar bya'o/_/yang na ma lus pa
[\[227a.6\]]zhes smos pas nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yin par shes par bya ste/_nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa/_/zhes smos pa'i phyir te/_zhi bar byed pa ni bral ba'o/_/gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/rgyu de nyid kyis na/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/_/zhes bya ste/_
[\[227a.7\]]nyes pa dang bral ba rnams ni 'khor bar 'khor ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro/_/'khor ba de nyid ni rgya mtsho ste/_blo byang bar ma byas pa rnams kyis rgya mtsho chen po ltar shin tu zab pa dang /_rgal bar dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i pha rol ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_rnam par rtog pa bsags pa dang
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]bral ba tsam gyis rtogs pa'i tshul gyi 'gro bas na/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/_/zhes bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni ye shes so/_/ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cod pan ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga las bsgrubs pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir/_rdzogs
[\[227b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs/_/zhes bya ste/_des dbang bskur bas na/_ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs/_/zhes bshad do/_/yang na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni cod pan gyi ngo bo nyid de/_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las gzhan pa gser la
[\[227b.3\]]sogs pa las brdungs pa'i cod pan ni ma yin no/_/de nyid kyis na/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs/_/zhes bya ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mnga' bas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang ldan pa ste/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyan ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
[\[227b.4\]]shes so zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal gsum ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal te/_rims dang /_phol mig dang /_klad pa gzer ba la sogs pa ni/_sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal lo/_/yongs su 'gyur pa'i sdug bsngal te/_dug gis sbags
[\[227b.5\]]pa'i kha zas ngan pa cung zad mngar ba tsam la rjes su bsten pas yongs su gyur pa dang 'dra bar 'dod chags la sogs pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa'o/_/'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bsal te skye ba dang gnas pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid can du gyur pa yin la/_gang mi rtag pa de nyid ni sdug
[\[227b.6\]]bsngal zhes bya ste/_de yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pas sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/_/yang na nang gi bdag nyid can la sogs pa dang lha sdang ba la sogs pa las byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa dang /_las la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum ni sdug bsngal gsum
[\[227b.7\]]mo/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdug bsngal ba'i dbye bas rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar mdzad pas na/_sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi/_/zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi sdug bsngal de zhi bar byas kyang phyi'i don dang /_nang la bdag tu
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]mngon par zhen pa rnams la ni slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_gsum sel zhes bya ba smos te/_sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum po de rnams sel ba ni mthar 'byung zhing slar mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur pas na gsum sel lo/_/bdag nyid
[\[228a.2\]]kyang mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cing sems can mtha' yas pa'i don mdzad pas na mtha' yas so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i dbye bas phye ba'i rnam par grol ba gsum po de dag la thams cad dug dul
[\[228a.3\]]bya'i skye bo rnams kyi dbang du mdzad de bdag nyid de dang de'i gzugs su ston pas na grol gsum thob ces bshad do/_/don dam par ni gang nas kyang ma byon la gang du yang mi bzhud de/_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /_las kyi
[\[228a.4\]]sgrib pa dang bral bas na/_sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/_/zhes bya'o/_/sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid dang /_sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed par mdzad pas na/_mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas/_/zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/_/zhes bya ba la nyon mongs
[\[228a.5\]]pa'i dri ma thams cad spangs bar gyur pa'am/_gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad las 'das par gyur pas na/_nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/_/zhes bya'o/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum du brtags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams las 'das pa'i
[\[228a.6\]]nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na/_dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po/_/zhes bya'o/_/gdul dka' ba rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bsdams shing legs par 'dul ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba la dpa' bas klu chen po ste/_

[\[237a.1\]]pa'i ngang tshul ni snang ba bo'o/_/ka ni bde ba/_ra ni ster ba ste/_de bas bde ba ster ba'i phyir lag na ka ra zhes bya'o/_/de ltar na bde ba ster ba yang yin la/_'od 'bar snang ba bo yang yin pas na de skad ces bya'o/_/de lta bu'i ma rig pa sel bar byed pa'i bde ba ster bar
[\[237a.2\]]byed pa'i snang ba'i ngo bo nyid ni rang nyid yin pas rje btsun 'jam dpal la/_bde sbyin 'od 'bar snang ba po/_/zhes bya'o/_/de rnams rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i mtshan rnams dang ldan zhing /_dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni nyid kyi don
[\[237a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bstan nas/_bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_/sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_nad thams cad rnam par zlog par byed pa bdag med pa rnam pa
[\[237a.4\]]gnyis ston par mdzad pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi sman stsol zhing nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams gso bar mdzad pas na sman pa che mchog go/_/bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba can gyi nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi'i khyad par ston par mdzad pas na gtso bo'o/_/thog ma med pa'i skye ba gcig
[\[237a.5\]]nas gcig tu brgyud de/_zug pa'i zug rngu'i gzugs can 'dod chags la sogs pa'i zug rngu rtsa ba nas 'byin pas na/_zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa'o/_/sman rnams ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyar zhing bsgrub pas nyon mongs pa'i nad ma lus pa zhi bar mdzad pas na/_sman
[\[237a.6\]]rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing /_/zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams nyid gsod pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas na nad do cog go/_/de rnams kyi dgra ni dgra bo ltar rigs rgyud du bcas pa zad par mdzad pas na/_nad do cog gi dgra che ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dgrar gyur du zin kyang
[\[237a.7\]]mi mthun pa'i gzugs ni nam yang mi mnga'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog_/dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/_/zhes bya ba gsungs te/_thams cad kyis 'dod par bya ba yin pas na sdu gu'o/_/khams gsum gyi mchog tu gyur pas na/_
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]'jig rten gsum gyi mchog go/_/skar ma rnams kyi nang na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar lha la sogs pa rnams kyi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du yid 'phrog pa'i sku mnga' bas na/_dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can no/_/phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams mthas
[\[237b.2\]]gtugs pa rnams su chos kyi sbyin pa'i ba dan bsgrengs pas nye bar mtshon pa'i don chen po 'dzugs par mdzad pas na/_phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i mthar thug par/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/_/zhes bya'o/_/char bab pa dang tsha ba'i nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par byed pa'i phyir dang /_
[\[237b.3\]]yongs su dub pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i grib ma byed pa'i phyir/_gdugs dang 'dra bas na gdugs te/_'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa'i grib ma byed cing sdug bsngal gyi char dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel bas na 'gro na gdugs gcig go/_/'gro ba rnams khyab par byed pa'i
[\[237b.4\]]gdugs gcig gi bdag nyid can yin zhing /_byams pa dang snying rje dag gis kun nas 'khor ba'i tshul gyis 'gebs pas na/_'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/_byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/_/zhes bya'o/_/'dam na gnas kyang dri mas ma gos pa'i phyir pad+ma dang 'dra ste/_'khor
[\[237b.5\]]ba'i 'dam du gnas pa'i nyes pas ma gos par gdul bya ji ltar 'dul ba dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i cha lugs dang /_rgyan dang /_sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar stabs la dgyes shing /_zhal dang /_tshems dang /_spyan dang /_smin ma gnyer ba sna tshogs pa dang /_phyag gi rtse mo dang zhabs rnam par rol
[\[237b.6\]]pas sgeg pa'i thabs kyis gar mdzad par ston cing /_/sems can ma lus pa 'dul bar mdzad pas na/_dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag_/ces bya'o/_/'byor pa dang /_'od kyis snang bar bya ba'i phyir/_dga' ba rgyas par byed pas na rin po che ste/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin can gyi gdugs gang yin pa
[\[237b.7\]]de ni/_khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/_/zhes bya ste/_thams cad kyi bdag po rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na/_sangs rgyas kun te mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o/_/de rnams kyi dbus su rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i tshul gyis

[\[238a.1\]]mdzes pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/_/zhes bya'o/_/don yod par grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bya ba rdzogs par mdzad pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/rnal 'byor chen po skye gnas che/_/sangs rgyas kun gnas mi zad

[\[238a.6\]]kun no/_/de rnams kyi bdag po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste/_sangs rgyas hUM mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na/_rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/_/zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang /_thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ni sangs
[\[238a.7\]]rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po ste/_de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi thugs la khyab pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/_/zhes bya'o/_/mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis rjes
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]su brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad sku'i gzugs su bdag nyid ston pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung thams cad la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/_/zhes bya'o/_/rdo rje ye shes kyi nyi ma'i tshul
[\[238b.2\]]gyis phyi dang nang gi mun pa dang /_ma rig pa sel bar mdzad cing snang bar gyur pas na/_rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/_/zhes bya'o/_/mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi zla ba'i gzugs kyis nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel bar mdzad cing /_dri ma med de/_bsil zhing yid sim par byed pa'i 'od zer rab tu gtong bar mdzad
[\[238b.3\]]pas na/_rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/_/ces bya'o/_/chags pa dang bral ba la sogs pa gdul bya'i sems can rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/_shin tu mngon par zhen par mdzad pas na/_/chags bral la sogs chags pa che/_/zhes bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi 'od de nyid kha dog sna tshogs par 'bar zhing /_
[\[238b.4\]]yid kyi las rnams mchog tu ston pa gang yin pa de ni/_kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/_/ces bya'o/_/yang na stong pa nyid dang thugs rje chen po can gyi snying po dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems de la de skad ces bya ste/_de nyid sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu shin tu che ba nyid kyi rgyur gyur pas na sangs rgyas thams
[\[238b.5\]]cad kyi thugs te/_de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/de nyid dpag tu med pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i gzugs su gyur nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la
[\[238b.6\]]gnas/_/zhes bya'o/_/rdo rje yongs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bor gyur pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba'o/_/ljags kyi pad+ma'i zla ba dang /_rdo rje'i steng du dkar po dang /_dkar po ma yin pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs kyi gsung gi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bas na/_sangs
[\[238b.7\]]rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/_/zhes bya'o/_/shin tu yongs su rdzogs nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rgyab tu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs kyi dbyer med par/_thams cad la snang ba chen por mdzad pas na/_rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ba'o/_/thugs kyi zla ba'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su gnyis

[\[239a.1\]]su med par snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba chen po'i 'od zer dri ma med pa rab tu dgyes pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pas na/_rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo 'ba' zhig gis bzhugs par ma zad kyi/_gzhan yang

[\[239a.5\]]rgyas rnams ni 'gro ba ni/_'dus nas chos kyi 'brel ba'i gtam mdzad pa'o/_/de yang thun mong ma yin pas sangs rgyas kho na la srid kyi gzhan la ma yin pas na/_sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa'o/_/gang gi phyir/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pas na/_dpal ldan no/_/_
[\[239a.6\]]gos pa med pa'i chos nyid du chos mthun pas na/_sangs rgyas nyid pad+ma ste/_de rnams las byung ba'i skye ba'i chos kyi skye gnas su gyur pa ste/_de bas na/_sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes zhes bya'o/_/kun mkhyen pa ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin par mdzad cing /_tshogs
[\[239a.7\]]gnyis ma tshang ba med pas te/_'dzin pa'i nus pa mnga' bas na/_dpal dang ldan zhing /_kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/_/zhes bya'o/_/'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs shing /_tha dad pa'i 'gro ba rnams la sbrul ba'i sgyu 'phrul spro ba la bdag por gyur cing thams cad du sprul ba'i byed pa por
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gyur pas na/_rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang /_/zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni rig pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa mdzad pa'i bdag nyid chen po dang /_shin tu ldan

[\[239b.3\]]shin tu yang so sor rtogs pas na rdo rje rnon po'o/_/bdag tu gti mug pa la dmigs pa'i rtsa ba can 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i shing chen po gcod par mdzad pas na ral gri chen po'o/_/don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi

[\[239b.5\]]lus par bcad pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi sku thugs su chud pas rnam par mi rtog pa nyid du gyur pa ni badzra tIk+Sh+Na zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don yin no/_/sngags gnyis pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir/_/theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/_/mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos/_/zhes bya ba gsungs te/_sdug
[\[239b.6\]]bsngal ma lus par gcod pa ni theg pa chen po nyid kyis nus so/_/de bas na sdug bsngal ma lus pa gcod pa'i bdag nyid can theg pa chen po dang /_de'i rdo rje'i chos nyid mi phyed pa yin te/_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid ni sems can ma lus pa'i the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i phyir mtshon cha chen
[\[239b.7\]]po'o/_/de yang 'di skad ston par 'gyur te/_theg pa chen po thams cad ni rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi don ston pa yin te/_duH khats+tshe da zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don yin no/_/sngags gsum pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir/_rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzika/_/ces bya ba gsungs te/_sangs rgyas shes rab ye shes kyi/_/snying
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]po dzin dzig tu bshad/_/ces gsungs pas/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgoms pas yongs su rdzogs pas phyed cing rtogs par dka' la/_mnyam pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi blo dang ldan pas na rdo rje ltar zab pa ni rdo rje blo gros so/_/de nyid kyis na don bzhin rig_/ces bya ba ste/_

[\[240a.7\]]kyi bdag nyid can gyi ye shes kyi sku brnyes pas na bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/_dz+nyA na kA ya zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don yin no/_/sngags lnga pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_sgyu 'phrul ni sprul pa'o/_/sgyu 'phrul nyid 'ching ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na dra ba'o/_/sgyu 'phrul chen

[\[240b.1\]]po brtul ba gang la yod pa de la ni de skad ces bya'o/_/sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_lha rnams kyi rnal 'byor dang /_las kyi tshogs la sogs pa rgyud cing nges par bya ba byed pas na rgyud do/_/rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po'i mchog ni rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs ji lta
[\[240b.2\]]ba nyid de/_'di skad ston par 'gyur te/_sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis bya ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi bdag por gyur pas gsung gi 'khor lo thams cad bskor bas na bA gI shwa ra zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don yin

[\[240b.4\]]thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ra ni chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad ni thugs rje chen pos chags par mdzad pa'o/_/pa ni skye ba med pa dang /_thugs rje chen po'i chags pa'i thugs rje dang thabs kyi bdag nyid du gyur pas na don dam pa'o/_/tsa ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin

[\[241a.1\]]skye gnas chen po ni/_sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/_/zhes bya ste/_gar+b+ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni snying po la yang yod de/_shing gi snying po bzhin no/_/bskyed pa la yang yod de/_mnga' ba bzhin no/_/de bas na bskyed pa'i don ltar na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams

[\[241a.3\]]'dir shes rab can gyis gzhan dag kyang dpag par bya ba sbyar bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang /_/zhes bya ba la/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus par gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don thams cad grub pa nam
[\[241a.4\]]mkha' ltar dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i don gyi dgos pa sbas te/_'dug pas na phyin ci ma log pa'i man ngag las brgyud de 'ongs pa bshad par bya'o/_/de ni dkyus ma nyid la 'jug par bya ste/_dngos po kun gyi rang
[\[241a.5\]]bzhin 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dka' 'grel gyi tshul du byas te/_shin tu rgya che bar ni ma spros so/_/de la dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni skye ba med pa'i stong pa ste/_de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis na mchog ste/_gtso bo yin pas na/_dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog_/ces
[\[241a.6\]]bya ba la/_de nyid kyis na/_dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/_/zhes bya'o/_/chos can gyi ngo bo nyid du bshad nas/_chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_skye med chos te sna tshogs don/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_gang la skye ba med pa'i chos te/_chos
[\[241a.7\]]can la brten pa nyid kyis brtags na skye ba med pas na/_de la brten pa'i chos rnams ni shin tu yang skye ba med pa nyid do zhes pa'i skye ba med pa'i don ni chos thams cad kyi don yin no/_/de bas na/_chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/rtog par bya ba'i chos kyi rim pa med
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]pas rtog pa'i rim pa yang med do zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_shes rab chen pos skad cig la/_/chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_'di ltar phrin las yongs su shas cher sbyangs pa shes bya thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab gang
[\[241b.2\]]yin pa de ni shes rab chen po yin te/_gang gi phyir skad cig ma gcig gis chos thams cad thugs su chud pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin la/_de de'i bdag nyid kyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na/_shes rab chen pos skad cig la/_/chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang /_/zhes bshad
[\[241b.3\]]do/_/'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i chos thams cad do/_/de rnams mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud pa gang
[\[241b.4\]]yin pa de ni/_chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/_/zhes bya'o/_/thub pa zhes bya ba ni sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs thub pa dang ldan pas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las ldog cing dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par ldan pas na thub pa'o/_/blo mchog ni chos thams cad thugs su chud pa dang
[\[241b.5\]]ldan pa'i blo gang yin pa de ni blo mchog go/_/'byung ba ni bden pa ste/_de kho na nyid do/_/de'i mthar ni mthar thug pa ste/_de kho na nyid kyi mtha' thugs su chud pa ni 'byung po'i mtha' zhes bya'o/_/yang na 'byung po ni srog chags rnams so/_/de'i mtha' ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_skye ba'i mthar
[\[241b.6\]]thug pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis thub pa ni thub pa yang dag mtha' zhes bya'o/_/mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag_/ces bya ba la sogs pa la gnas ngan len dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pas na brtan zhing mi 'gyur
[\[241b.7\]]bar gnas pa ni mi g.yo ba'o/_/ma rig pa dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bas shin tu yang rab kyi mthar thug pas dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku'i rang bzhin can yin pas na rab tu snang ba'i bdag go/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]shes te/_nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad pa dang /_slar yang mi skye bdag ni dus gcig pa ste/_rkun ma phyung ba dang sgo gtan bcug pa lta bu dang /_tshul mthun no zhes bye brag tu smra ba dag 'dod do/_/zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes dri ma med pa'i byang chub bshad par

[\[242a.5\]]thams cad las rnam par grol pa'i ye shes ni shes bya thams cad snang ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas me lce dang 'dra bas na ye shes me lce ste/_de ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od rab tu gsal ba'o/_/de bas na rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa yin te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang
[\[242a.6\]]chub ni nam yang mngon sum du ma gyur pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas mngon sum du gyur pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes me lce 'od rab tu gsal ba'o/_/'dod pa'i don zhes bya ba la/_'dod pa ni dgos pa'i gtso bo ste/_sangs rgyas nyid do/_/mtho

[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]na/_'dod pa'i don dam sgrub pa ste/_/zhes bya'o/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_yi dgas dang /_dud 'gror 'gro ba 'jug par byed pa'i las kyi gnyen por gyur pa thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams ston par mdzad pas na/_ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/_/mgon po sems

[\[242b.3\]]bdag gir mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba 'dod chags la sogs pa'o/_/de dang lhan cig tu g.yul sprod pas na nyon mongs pa'i g.yul der dpa' bo gcig pa'o/_/dgra gang yin zhe na/_mi shes pa'i dgra bo de'i dregs pa ni bdag nyid gcig pu nyid kyis sems can ma lus pa mi shes pa'i zhags pas

[\[243a.1\]]kyi spyod pa rjes su mkhyen nas rjes su dga' bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis ni sgeg pa'o/_/de 'dzin par mdzad pas na sgeg 'chang ngo /_/glegs bam la la las ni/_blo ldan sgeg 'chang dpal ldan zhes zer te/_der ni bde gshegs dri med pa'i/_/shes rab rdo rje rnam par

[\[243b.1\]]cad khyab cing sku dang /_phyag dang zhabs kyis khyab pa'i rnam par rol pa rnams kyis gar mdzad cing sgyu 'phrul chen po'i gar gyi dbang phyug tu gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni/_lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing /_/gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/_/dpal ldan lag pa

[\[244b.1\]]no/_/rang dgar ni phyi rol gyi bstan bcos la mtshams sbyor te/_brtags pas gzhan du tshigs bcad byas pa ni mi rigs te/_lung ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro/_/'dul pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pas sems can sna tshogs pa'i rgyud la sems can rnams 'dul bar

[\[244b.7\]]gi ngo bo nyid thugs su chud pa las sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyi dngos po la mngon par zhen pa las gzhan pas dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dpyod par mi 'byung ngo /_/de bas na dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i skye bo rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/_dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'/_/zhes bya'o/_/_

[\[245a.1\]]don dam par ni stong pa nyid la dga' zhing mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par zhen pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba nyid stong ba nyid la dga' ba'o/_/gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams gnyis la mngon par zhen cing shin tu chags pa ni sring ba'i 'dod chags te/_

[\[245b.1\]]'khor gyi mdangs ltar dmar ba'i 'od gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/'di skad ston par 'gyur te/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyi sku dang ldan pas/_/sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/_/zhes bya'o/_/shes rab kyi 'od zer 'phro bas rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od mnga' bas na 'od

[\[245b.5\]]'dod pa'i don yang dag par rdzogs par mdzad pa la gzhol pas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya'o/_/de rnams kyi 'od chags pa ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i 'od zer rnams te/_'od zer de rnams kyis mdzes pa'i dpal gang la yod pa de ni/_nor bu chen po'i 'od chags dpal/_/zhes

[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]byed do/_/bag chags kyang yang dag par 'jog par byed do/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni phung po thams cad nges par 'dor bar byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las yang dag par 'da'o/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni skye
[\[254a.2\]]ba'i lus yongs su sbyor bar byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni chos kyi sku yongs su sbyor bar byed do/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi gtong bas ni pham las byung ba'i stobs sgrub par byed/_/stobs de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub
[\[254a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par su la yang med do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs sgrub par byed do/_/stobs de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par su la yang med do/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni yongs su smin par
[\[254a.4\]]byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni rnam pa tha dad par byed do/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni tshogs stsogs so/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni sgrol lo/_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni nor yongs su gtong ngo /_/chos kyi gtong bas ni thams cad gtong ngo /_/gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni nyon mongs
[\[254a.5\]]pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do/_/chos kyi gtong bas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do/_/gzhan yang gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs su rtog pa gtong ba'i tshig bla dgas so/_/'di lta ste/_yongs su rtog pa gtong ba de ni gtong ba rnams kyi dam pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir
[\[254a.6\]]zhe na/_yongs su rtog pa btang bas byang chub sems dpa' dag pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di de gang gi tshig bla dgas/_smras pa rigs kyi bu yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing /_med pa las sgro btags pa'i tshig bla dgas so/_/smras
[\[254a.7\]]pa/_ji ltar na yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las sgro btags pa yin/_smras pa/_nam 'di ltar bdag ni chags pa/_bdag ni zhe sdang ba/_bdag ni gti mug pa/_bdag ni nyon mongs pa/_bdag ni rnam par dag pa/_bdag ni bcings pa/_bdag ni grol ba/_bdag ni 'khor ba/_bdag ni yongs
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]su mya ngan 'das pa'o snyam pa la sogs par sgro btags pa thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las yongs su btags pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di dag thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen tsam ste/_'di la bdag dang bdag gi ba med pa/_sems can med/_srog med/_gang zag med/_shed
[\[254b.2\]]las skyes med do/_/shed bu med do/_/rgyu dang rkyen de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa/_rang bzhin gyis dben pa/_sems dang yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_mi sems pa/_yongs su mi rtog pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa/_rnam par byang ba ma yin pa/_'khor ba ma yin pa/_yongs su
[\[254b.3\]]mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin pa la sgro mi 'dogs shing de sgro 'dogs pa btang bas gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o/_/nam chos de dag rjes su dran pa de ni de'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong
[\[254b.4\]]ba rnam pa gsum ste/_gtong ba dang /gtang ba chen po dang /_shin tu gtong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bza' ba dang /_'dod pa rnams la bza' ba'i sbyin pa dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_mar me dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng
[\[254b.5\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_shing rta dang /_rgyan la sogs pa sbyin pa ste/_sbyin pa gang sems can rnams la gnod pa dang /_phangs par 'gyur ba de ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la mi sbyin pa gang yang
[\[254b.6\]]med de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba chen po gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba phun sum tshogs nas gtong ba chen po byed de/_'di lta ste/_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i bran pho
[\[254b.7\]]dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_khyim dang /_rgyal srid rnams yongs su gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba chen po zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang /_gtong ba chen
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]po phun sum tshogs nas shin tu gtong ba byed de/_'di lta ste/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_pags pa dang /_mig dang /_lce dang /_mgo rus dang /_rkang la sogs pa yongs su gtong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong

[\[255a.3\]]gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gang rnam par dag pa'i lha nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag rjes su dran no/_/'di ltar
[\[255a.4\]]de dag rjes su dran te sgrub pa dang /_yon tan dang /_skye ba dang /_longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa dang /_rtsom pa dang /_rab tu thob pa dang /_yongs su grub pas kyang rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang lha gzhan de dag kyang rjes su dran no/_/'di ltar de dag rjes su dran te/_lha 'di dag
[\[255a.5\]]ni las dge ba'i 'bras bu las byung ba'o/_/dge ba'i las de dag ni 'di lta ste/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog pa rnams so/_/de la lha gang rnams kha dog dang ldan pa/_bde ba mnga' ba/_dbang po tshim pa/_de thams cad ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi rnam par smin pa'o snyam ste/_de la

[\[255a.7\]]par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen po rtsom mo/_/ngan song rnams su skyes pa'i sems can dag la snying rje chen po bskyed de/_de 'di snyam du bdag gis 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las byed du gzung ngo /_/sems can thams cad gang dag lhar gyur pa de dag ni bla na

[\[255b.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/gang gis sems can rnams la lha'i bde ba thob nas phyis nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bde bar gyur nas 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'i las de dag sems can rnams

[\[255b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i dran pa'i tshul can dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong gi bdag por gyur bas na/_dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal/_/zhes bya'o/_/byang chub yan lag me tog spos/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[255b.4\]]pa'i yon tan mtsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nyid ni me tog ste/_de rnams kyi dri ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i rab 'byam khyab pa'i yon tan dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi dri ni khyad par gang la yod pa de ni/_byang chub yan lag me tog spos/_/zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub
[\[255b.5\]]kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag

[\[256a.1\]]dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_gang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa ste/_chos gang dang /_gang ji lta ji lta bur rnam par dbye bar bya ba nges pa'i don kyang nges

[\[280a.1\]]par shes par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ni rnam pa bcur shes par bya ste/_rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur bar 'phrul ba dang /_brgya byin du 'phrul pa dang /_tshangs par 'phrul pa dang /_nyan thos su 'phrul pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su 'phrul pa

[\[280b.1\]]pa/_'dod dgu phun sum tshogs par sbyin pa/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/_'khor los sgyur ba phal gzhan rnams kyi lta bu ma yin no/_/bud med rin po che ni ha cang yang mi dkar/_ha cang yang mi sdo/_/ha cang yang mi ring /_ha cang yang mi thung /_ha cang yang mi

[\[281a.1\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor los sgyur ba 'phrul pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/nam 'jig rten na brgya byin gtso bor byed pa de na/_brgya byin gyi gzugs su sprul nas sum cu rtsa gsum

[\[301a.6\]]pas bsgyur/_/legs bkrol rgya chen don la rmongs gyur bas/_/log par bsgyur sogs tshul min bgyis pa 'chags/_/sgra dang don mkhas nus ldan byung gyur na/_/tshig don brtags la nor ba bcos par gsol/_/chos don gnyer zhing mtshan mchog rgyas byas pas/_/dam pa'i zhing 'dir
[\[301a.7\]]dge ba gang bskrun des/_/'gro kun mtshan rtogs blo yi skyon bral zhing /_/bdag kyang blo mchog 'jam dbyangs mtshungs par shog_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra barma dang /_ka ma la gup+ta dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//
